Shout-outs

OMEO isn't created in isolation. I'd really like to thank the entities listed below!

A big thank-you to

The Fandom Minecraft wiki
for listing the exact anvil rules.
Sunnypwang's Anvil Calculator
for giving me the inspiration to make something bigger.
TrollyLoki's Anvil Calculator
for coming juuust before me and making it easy for me to verify my algorithm results.
GitHub
for hosting this project for me.
jQuery
for making JavaScript much easier to use.
Jazillionth
for making unit testing a breeze -- and, yes, this is a shameless plug for one of my own products :)
RealFaviconGenerator
for making it super easy to add favicons to your web pages.
Of course, Mojang
for making Minecraft!
And a very special person
for giving me all the motivation I needed.
